adHeader: Live BEE Swarm Removal by Experts, AFRICANIZED Bees & Wasps Removal
adDetails: If you or anyone you know has been invaded by BEE SWARMS and or are in need of Live BEE REMOVAL SERVICES to include AFRICANIZED BEES & Wasps as well... in the Bay Area, feel free to call on us. Don't put your life in danger, just call us or respond to this ad. Our Expert BEE REMOVAL Service Responder will take care of your problem as soon as possible. The average charge for Bee Removal may vary depending on the difficulty and the extra particular requirements of each job. We also charge .85 cents per mile for work-related-travel. The State of California has provisions which protect honey bees from being killed by poisonous sprays. Therefore, whenever possible we try our best to remove them alive to relocate them into a hive to a safe location. For BEE Related Problems you may call us at: 510.six eight eight.116one... Or simply reply to this ad with your situation and the address of your Bee-Problem. We'll try to respond to your emergency needs ASAP...
